website_summaries.verdict: The Plantronics Voyager Pro UC combines a perennial favorite design with cutting-edge technology that results in a modern yet reliable headset.
pros: The Plantronics Voyager Pro UC has Smart Sensor technology that lets you route calls automatically to the headset or phone, play or pause music automatically, and more
It also features A2DP streaming, multipoint connectivity, and great audio quality to boot
cons: The Plantronics Voyager Pro UC is not that much different from its predecessors, and it is currently not compatible with Plantronics' own Vocalyst automated phone service
We also think it's too expensive

customer_reviews.title: Great headset
customer_reviews.text: I use Skype for business and also have an iPhone so the Voyager UC allows me to use both seamlessly. The sound is great, battery life is good and wearing it all day it is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Your can make better use of your money!
customer_reviews.text: Works Okay. Expensive compared to many other BT headsets that work as swell or better, for 25% of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Voyager Pro
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't like things in my ear, so I'm picky when picking headsets. The Voyager series is a good fit in the inner ear and hangs on around the ear without feeling it's going to fall off better than anything I've seen. This is my second Voyager as the last broke after 3-4 years of frequent use. I like the Voyager Pro UC with the USB that can connect either to my PC or Smartphone...although the sound coming from the PC is not match for a true two-ear-piece stereo headset.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Pro Model has Less Features
customer_reviews.text: Not really the fault of Price Pros but if you want to stream music from your phone to your Voyager, this ain't the product to use. In fact, the Pro plus is less money from Amazon and Price Pros is selling the older version. BEWARE!!! Without the plus it doesn't stream from your phone even though the manual and Plantronics website claims it does. After calling Plantronics and talking with a helpful lady in India, I find that the $124 was a waste. Hope that helps you. I know have ordered the Pro Plus model from another seller.
customer_reviews.author: Cash

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It works great as I work from home and don't want to wear a heavy headset.
customer_reviews.author: MartyGirl

customer_reviews.title: headset
customer_reviews.text: Not so happy with the comfort makes my ear sore, and I would like to switch ears, go from left to right, am not able to.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for the auto detection feature that would switch to the regular phone when the bluetooth is nor being worn. Surprise! It doesn't work. They don't tell you that the feature is only available on the V2. They describe the feature, so you think that is what you are buying, but what you actually get is the V1.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: This item does not keep charge and will not answer calles all the time. I looked at the reviews and thats why I paid good monies for this model. ( NOT AGAIN )
customer_reviews.author: Shooter1

customer_reviews.title: Plantronics
customer_reviews.text: Linking was a snap, and it really is quite weightless on your ear. People I call say that there is no road noise when I talk in the car anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Blue tooth adaptor: Cannot get it to work with Windows 7.0 on my laptop.
customer_reviews.text: The blue tooth USB adaptor does not seem to work with Windows 7.0 so i cannot use the product with my HP 2540p lapotp. I am running 32 bit. The headset works fine pared with my Blackberry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work with cisco vpn
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to get this product to work called support but all they do is point me my technical people and say it's their fault. You know everyone points at someone else cause they don't want to bother to figure out what is wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with it so far
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize I was buying a product that was not new, but being my first time purchasing one, I am very happy with it so far. This is my 3rd Plantronics bluetooth and I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Spike GD

customer_reviews.title: Could not ask for a better headset
customer_reviews.text: I do not use this for personal applications. I actually run a call center and this is the headset we use to allow my employees to roam while they chat with customers. The battery lasts almost all day with out a recharge (my employees recharge it during their lunches just to be safe). The Voyager pro is loud and clear. We are very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jantzen S. Gambill

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable and definitely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: By now there may be better earpieces that have noise cancelling abilities for the receiver (the call recipient on the other end) to hear the user. But this is a very good earpiece that lays very comfortably over the ear. Two years later I still have it and still use it.
customer_reviews.author: paisan

customer_reviews.title: For Speech reconition
customer_reviews.text: The product works great will my mobile cell services. I had no problems hooking up to other systems running speech recognition software and begin a speech presentation.
customer_reviews.author: matthew louie

customer_reviews.title: The best Bluetooh head set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife, and was amazed when I heard it for the first time. It was so clear and had no background noise, I didn't believe her when she told she was driving. The head set is Great!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Performance is good.
customer_reviews.text: Complicated to program and uncomfortable to wear. Performance is good.
customer_reviews.author: Ferrari Driver

customer_reviews.title: The best Bluetooth device I have had !
customer_reviews.text: This wireless headset works well ! The sound is clear, volume ample even while driving highway speeds, and despite it's size the unit is very comfortable to wear. I use it as a simple Bluetooth device while I drive or when I just need my hands free. Was priced right as well. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Baublitz

customer_reviews.title: Second best headset I have ever boought
customer_reviews.text: Second best headset I have ever bought . . . because I own a Plantronics Voyager Legend UC which is the best.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: I use it for Skype on my Laptop. Works great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: not working with mac
customer_reviews.text: i do lots of chats with programmers and designers and they can't hear me with this thing it's not working on my macbook either.
customer_reviews.author: ALK

product_meta.title: Plantronics Voyager PRO UC WG200/B Wireless Headset
product_meta.description: Unifies communication between PCs and mobile from a single handset. Dual noise-canceling microphones with AudioIQ²® and three layers of WindSmart® technology. Headset call controls and answer/end mute and volume +/- functionality for switching between PC and mobile calls. Six hours of battery talk time with 120 hours on standby. Headset Type: Monaural Headset Style: Over The Ear Earpiece Type: Ear Cushion Earpiece Material: Foam.Unit of Measure : Each
feature_bullets: This product is compatible with most Bluetooth-enabled phones
Plantronics Vocalyst voice and text services
Enhanced voice alerts for added convenience

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars29 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
